title: Argentina at the 2008 Summer Paralympics
summary: Argentina sent a delegation to compete at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in Beijing. The country's flagbearer at the Games' opening ceremony was football player Silvio Velo.
content:
Argentina sent a delegation to compete at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in Beijing. The country's flagbearer at the Games' opening ceremony was football player Silvio Velo.

=== Football 5-a-side ===

The men's football 5-a-side team won the bronze medal after defeating Spain in the bronze medal match.


==== Players ====
Gonzalo Abbas Hachache
Diego Cerega
Eduardo Diaz
Ivan Figueroa
Jose Luiz Jimenez
Dario Aldo Lencina
Antonio Mendoza
